title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Navigate to the series page. 3. Ensure that there is no data available for any of the series. 4. Observe that no error message is displayed.
